mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `JSP_BOARD` SET cate=#{cate}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, file=#{file}, uid=#{uid}, regip=#{regip}, rdate=NOW();
mapper.select: SELECT B.*, M.nick FROM `JSP_BOARD` AS B JOIN `JSP_MEMBER` AS M ON B.uid = M.uid WHERE parent=0 AND cate='grow' ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT #{start}, 10;
